QuestData.Title: Calling of the Council
QuestData.Description: <The arcane anomaly addresses you in Khadgar's voice.>$B$BThough I am loathe to interrupt your fight against the Legion, I must request your help in a matter of... diplomacy. We face a grave threat, and we require the full might of Azeroth's people to overcome it.$b$bThe Horde must become part of the Kirin Tor once again. Some will not agree with this position.$b$bPlease join me outside the Violet Citadel in Dalaran. We have repositioned the city to defend the Eastern Kingdoms, above Karazhan.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Khadgar in Dalaran at its new location above Deadwind Pass.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Archmage Khadgar in Dalaran
Have Khadgar address the Council of Six
Take the Portal to Dalaran over Karazhan in the Cleft of Shadow
